name: list_nft
attributes: # [doc = " `listing_account` の owner チェックを行っていないため、"]
# [doc = " 攻撃者が任意アカウントを指定して他人のNFTを無断で出品できます"]
body: let acct = & mut ctx . accounts . listing_account . to_account_info () ;
let data = & mut acct . data . borrow_mut () ;
let size = std :: mem :: size_of :: < ListingData > () ;
listing . seller = ctx . accounts . seller . key () . to_bytes () ;
msg ! ("NFT {} listed by {} → price={}, fee={}bps, expires at slot={}" , acct . key () , ctx . accounts . seller . key () , price , fee_bps , expiry) ;
